title: Five minutes to Doomsday
description: Harmonizing his stream to the tune of life, the Acoustic Funambulist travels on time through the galaxies in a progression of unlikely encounters. Dodging black holes, almost starting a world war and having peculiar philosophical discussions are just normal episodes of the aerialist's voyage through the Universe.Already available:- The hair of the cometTo come:- Perpetual emotion- The uneventful galaxy
author: Jean-Yves Crozier
